about_the_game:
A never-before-seen horror game is the only evidence found at a crime scene. As a retired game designer hired to investigate the case, you find a hidden mode that pulls you into a spiraling descent into the unknown.

As you unearth more enigmatic games, you’ll breach the boundaries of their worlds, unraveling horrifying truths that transcend fiction—and even reality itself.

Features:

A Mind Bending Horror Narrative: Experience an intricate story that twists and turns through layers of fear, mystery, and unsettling truths.

Completely Original Gameplay: Innovative mechanics and meticulously crafted design deliver disturbing, unforgettable moments that linger well beyond your last save.

An Immersive Universe: A story-rich world and meaningful gameplay that act as a whole, full of surprises, secrets and terror.

Obsessively Meticulous Art Direction: Striking visuals that bring a believable universe to life to the last pixel, filled with rich character and hauntingly immersive areas that crawl under your skin.

Multi-layered puzzles: Solve original puzzles that unfold across multiple layers and are seamlessly integrated into the narrative world—no fillers.

Playmestudio is an independent studio which focuses on completely original, carefully crafted gaming experiences.

We’re pretty serious about games; we aim for the heart.

The Simulation is under active development. Published by Blumhouse Games.
